projects.name: InterviewAIde
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered platform that simulates personalized interview sessions based on user resumes. The system uses fine-tuned LLMs to generate tailored questions and provide real-time feedback.
projects.problem_statement: Job seekers struggle with interview preparation due to lack of personalized practice and feedback. Generic interview questions don't match their specific experience and job profiles.
projects.solution: Built an intelligent interview coaching system that analyzes user resumes, identifies key skills and experiences, and generates personalized interview questions using fine-tuned language models. The system provides contextual feedback and improvement suggestions.
key_features: Resume parsing and analysis using JavaScript backend
Fine-tuned open-source LLM for domain-specific question generation
Personalized interview sessions tailored to user profile
Real-time AI-driven feedback and coaching
Question difficulty adaptation based on user responses
Interview performance analytics and insights

technical_implementation.llm_finetuning: Fine-tuned an open-source language model on interview question datasets with specific focus on technical and behavioral questions
technical_implementation.resume_parsing: Implemented JavaScript-based resume parser to extract skills, experience, and qualifications
technical_implementation.question_generation: Used the fine-tuned LLM with prompt engineering to generate contextually relevant questions
technical_implementation.feedback_system: Developed AI evaluation system to assess answers and provide constructive feedback

challenges_solved: Fine-tuning LLMs with limited computational resources
Extracting structured data from diverse resume formats
Generating diverse and relevant interview questions
Providing meaningful feedback without over-prompting the LLM
projects.impact: Helps job seekers prepare for interviews with AI-powered personalized coaching, improving their confidence and performance.
learning_outcomes: LLM fine-tuning techniques and best practices
Prompt engineering for specific use cases

projects.name: NovelFlow
projects.description: Built a comprehensive cloud-native translation pipeline for Chinese web novels using Google's Gemini API with RAG-based context retrieval and automated glossary management for consistent, high-quality translations.
projects.problem_statement: Translating Chinese web novels manually is time-consuming and maintaining consistency across hundreds of chapters (character names, cultivation terms, places) is extremely challenging.
projects.solution: Created an automated translation system that uses cloud-native AI (Gemini 2.5) with RAG for context awareness, automated glossary extraction, entity verification, and multi-stage polishing to produce publication-ready translations.
key_features: Cloud-native translation using Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro models
RAG-based context retrieval using FAISS vector database
Automated glossary extraction and management for consistency
Intelligent chapter splitting and processing
Entity verification using Perplexity API
Translation polishing pipeline for natural English
Multi-format export (TXT, DOCX, EPUB)
Streamlit web interface for easy novel processing

technical_implementation.architecture: Cloud-native pipeline with modular components for ingestion, splitting, translation, polishing, and export
technical_implementation.rag_system: Used Sentence Transformers for embeddings and FAISS for efficient similarity search to retrieve relevant context
technical_implementation.glossary_management: Automatic extraction of character names, places, cultivation terms with category-based translation rules
technical_implementation.translation_engine: Leveraged Gemini 2.5 Flash for fast translation and Pro for quality polishing
technical_implementation.context_awareness: Maintains consistency by feeding previous chapter summaries and entity glossaries to the LLM

technical_components.ingest.py: Document text extraction from PDF, TXT, EPUB formats
technical_components.splitter.py: Intelligent chapter splitting with title detection
technical_components.translator.py: Cloud translation engine with Gemini API
technical_components.app.py: Streamlit UI orchestrating the entire pipeline

challenges_solved: Maintaining character name consistency across long novels
Handling cultural nuances and xianxia/wuxia genre terminology
Context window limitations with very long chapters
Rate limiting with cloud API calls
Building efficient RAG system for fast context retrieval
projects.impact: Automates hours of manual translation work while maintaining consistency and quality, enabling faster publication of web novels.

projects.name: Cravory
projects.description: Modern, interactive recipe discovery app that helps users find meals based on ingredients they have, their mood, or with a random surprise. Built with React, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS with smooth animations and API-driven recipe data.
projects.problem_statement: People often don't know what to cook with available ingredients or can't decide what meal matches their current mood or craving.
projects.solution: Created an intuitive recipe app with multiple discovery modes - ingredient-based search, mood-based recommendations, time-based filtering, and random recipe generator for culinary inspiration.
key_features: Ingredient-based search to find recipes using available items
Mood-based discovery (Comfort, Healthy & Fresh, Spicy, Sweet, International, Quick & Light)
Random recipe generator for surprise meal ideas
Time filter (15 min, 30 min, 1 hour, Any time)
Favorites system to save preferred recipes
Detailed recipe view with ingredients and step-by-step instructions
YouTube video tutorials when available
Modern UI with smooth animations and transitions
Responsive design for all devices

technical_implementation.frontend: Built with React and TypeScript for type safety and maintainability
technical_implementation.styling: TailwindCSS for modern, responsive design with custom animations
technical_implementation.api_integration: TheMealDB API for comprehensive recipe database
technical_implementation.state_management: React hooks for local state and favorites management
technical_implementation.animations: Custom CSS animations including animated pan on landing page
technical_implementation.build_tool: Vite for fast development and optimized production builds

challenges_solved: Creating smooth, performant animations
Filtering and searching large recipe datasets efficiently
Building intuitive mood-based categorization
Implementing favorites with localStorage persistence
Responsive design across various screen sizes
projects.impact: Makes cooking fun and effortless by helping users discover new recipes based on what they have or how they feel.

projects.name: College Management System
projects.description: Enterprise-level web application to digitize and streamline student attendance management for Muffakham Jah College of Engineering and Technology with dual authentication portals and real-time analytics.
projects.problem_statement: Manual attendance tracking was time-consuming, error-prone, and lacked real-time insights for both students and faculty at MJCET.
projects.solution: Built a comprehensive digital platform with role-based access for students and faculty, automated attendance workflows, real-time dashboards, and analytics for better decision-making.
key_features: Dual authentication system for students and faculty
Personalized dashboards with real-time attendance tracking
Automated attendance recording and management
Analytics and reporting features for faculty
Student portal to view attendance records and alerts
Faculty portal for marking and managing attendance
Low attendance notifications and alerts
Export attendance reports in multiple formats
Secure authentication and authorization
Responsive design for mobile and desktop

technical_implementation.backend: Node.js with Express.js for RESTful API development
technical_implementation.authentication: JWT-based authentication with role-based access control
technical_implementation.architecture: MVC pattern for organized code structure

challenges_solved: Designing scalable database schema for academic data
Implementing secure role-based access control
Real-time data synchronization across portals
Handling large datasets efficiently
Creating intuitive interfaces for non-technical users
projects.impact: Digitized attendance management for hundreds of students, saving countless hours of manual work and providing valuable insights.

projects.name: AI Portfolio Website
projects.tagline: Interactive Portfolio with Conversational AI Clone
projects.description: Modern, interactive portfolio website featuring a conversational AI clone powered by LLMs and RAG for intelligent responses about projects, skills, and experience. Built with React, Node.js, and Groq API.
projects.problem_statement: Traditional portfolios are static and don't engage visitors. Recruiters and visitors often have specific questions that aren't addressed on the page.
projects.solution: Created an interactive portfolio with an AI clone that can answer questions about projects, skills, experience, and availability using RAG-based knowledge retrieval from a curated knowledge base.
key_features: Conversational AI clone powered by Groq's LLM API
RAG-based knowledge retrieval for accurate responses
Real-time chat interface with smooth UX
Section-by-section snap navigation
Modern responsive design with TailwindCSS
Smooth animations and transitions
Project showcase with interactive carousel
Clickable certification badges
Contact form with social media integration
Hidden scrollbars for clean aesthetic

technical_implementation.frontend: React with Vite for fast development and optimized builds
technical_implementation.backend: Node.js/Express API server handling chat requests
technical_implementation.ai_integration: Groq API with llama3-8b-8192 model for conversational responses
technical_implementation.rag_system: Knowledge base stored in JSON files with context injection
technical_implementation.styling: TailwindCSS with custom animations and gradients
technical_implementation.architecture: Client-server architecture with RESTful API communication

challenges_solved: Integrating LLM API with portfolio data
Building efficient RAG system for context retrieval
Creating smooth section-by-section navigation
Designing intuitive chat interface without scrolling issues
Optimizing API calls and response times
projects.impact: Provides an engaging, interactive experience for recruiters and visitors, showcasing both technical skills and creativity.
